sentences.en: A style consultant will demonstrate how to dress to impress.
sentences.cn: 时尚顾问将示范如何穿着以给人留下深刻印象。

sentences.en: After the clinical examination, the consultant invited his students to put forward any suggestions they had kicked about the nature of the disease.
sentences.cn: 临床检查完毕, 会诊医师就请学生提出个人对该病性质的诊断意见.

sentences.en: Each specialist consultant has a team of doctors under him.
sentences.cn: 每位会诊专家手下都有一组医生。

sentences.en: He is now a consultant psychologist with a major London hospital.
sentences.cn: 他现时在伦敦一家大医院里担任心理学顾问.

sentences.en: He set up shop as an independent PR consultant.
sentences.cn: 他自己开公司，做起了独立公共关系顾问。

sentences.en: He was a consultant physician, a serious man dedicated to his calling.
sentences.cn: 他是个会诊医生，严肃认真，对自己的职业全身心投入。

sentences.en: He was consultant rheumatologist at the Royal Hampshire Hospital.
sentences.cn: 他是皇家汉普郡医院的风湿病学顾问。

sentences.en: I'm not the consultant type. I flourish where the action is.
sentences.cn: 我不是当顾问的料, 我是从实干中冒出来的.

sentences.en: I've decided to set up shop as a consultant.
sentences.cn: 我决定开办一家咨询公司.

sentences.en: Originally, Gar had agreed to come up as a consultant.
sentences.cn: 原来, 加尔只答应来充当我们的顾问.

sentences.en: She earns more since she repackaged herself as a business consultant.
sentences.cn: 自从把自己重新包装成商业顾问以来，她的收入增加了。

sentences.en: Shirley's brother is now a consultant heart surgeon in Sweden.
sentences.cn: 雪利的兄弟现在在瑞典做心脏外科高级顾问医师。

sentences.en: So she contacted his consultant at once to consult with him about this.
sentences.cn: 于是她立刻联系他的顾问医生向他请教怎么办。

sentences.en: The consultant seeks to match up jobless professionals with small companies in need of expertise.
sentences.cn: 这个顾问力求使失业的专业人员找到需要专门技术的小公司。

sentences.en: The consultant who suggested using spamming to raise the company's profile has been fired.
sentences.cn: 建议用群发邮件的方法来提升公司形象的那个顾问已经被解雇了。

sentences.en: The spy's cover was that she was a consultant engineer.
sentences.cn: 那女间谍伪装成顾问工程师.

words.tran_cn: 咨询；磋商；[临床] 会诊；讨论会

phrases.tran_cn: 营销顾问；市场顾问；销售顾问

trans.tran_en: someone whose job is to give advice on a particular subject
